Product.sd: <strong>Cartzilla</strong>&nbsp;is the ultimate e-commerce front-end template based on the latest Bootstrap 5 framework. Along with styling all the default Bootstrap components it introduces lots of new flexible elements you can use across website.&nbsp;<strong>40+ components</strong>&nbsp;in total (plus sign means some components have multiple style variations). Besides well thought out&nbsp;<strong>Store Front pages (Homepage, Catalog, Categories)</strong>, Cartzilla includes pages of&nbsp;<strong>User Account, Cart, Checkout</strong>, etc. to ensure your online shop will provide smooth and engaging user experience. Every successful e-commerce website should have&nbsp;<strong>Blog (News)</strong>&nbsp;section,&nbsp;<strong>About Us</strong>&nbsp;information,&nbsp;<strong>Contact details</strong>,&nbsp;<strong>Help / FAQ</strong>&nbsp;section to engage with its visitors. Cartzilla includes all this along with service pages like: 404 Not Found, etc. More Front pages and Secondary pages are coming in the future updates. &nbsp;
